title: M Hsst Drtyu
description: A prequel to "The Bennu Project" which is also included in the Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture catalogue. The fans of the Bennu Project will be able to see a glimpse into the life of Sovereign Roha. Learn what happened long before the events in TBP from her perspective. Long awaited answers will be given and new questions will arise in this new trilogy.
author: Tyrone Givens
